register.name: CPTR_EL3
register.description: Controls trapping to EL3 of access to CPACR_EL1, CPTR_EL2, trace functionality and registers associated with SVE, Advanced SIMD and floating-point execution. Also controls EL3 access to trace functionality and registers associated with SVE, Advanced SIMD and floating-point execution.

bitField.name: TCPAC
bitField.description: Traps all of the following to EL3, from both Security states and both Execution states.

bitField.name: TTA
bitField.description: Traps System register accesses to the trace registers, from all Exception levels, both Security states, and both Execution states, to EL3.

bitField.name: TFP
bitField.description: Traps all accesses to SVE, Advanced SIMD and floating-point functionality, from all Exception levels, both Security states, and both Execution states, to EL3.

bitField.name: EZ
bitField.description: Present only if SVE is implemented.

tcf:enumItem.description: This control does not cause any instructions to be trapped.
tcf:enumItem.name: This_control_does_not_cause_any_instructions_to_be_trapped

tcf:enumItem.description: EL2 accesses to the CPTR_EL2 or HCPTR, and EL2 and EL1 accesses to the CPACR_EL1 or CPACR, are trapped to EL3, unless they are trapped by CPTR_EL2.TCPAC.
tcf:enumItem.name: EL2_accesses_to_the_CPTR_EL2_or_HCPTR_and_EL2_and_EL1_accesses_to_the_CPACR_EL1_or_CPACR_are_trapped_to_EL3_unless_they_are_trapped_by_CPTR_EL2

tcf:enumItem.description: This control does not cause any instructions to be trapped.
tcf:enumItem.name: This_control_does_not_cause_any_instructions_to_be_trapped

tcf:enumItem.description: Any System register access to the trace registers is trapped to EL3, subject to the exception prioritization rules, unless it is trapped by CPACR.NSTRCDIS, CPACR_EL1.TTA or CPTR_EL2.TTA.
tcf:enumItem.name: Any_System_register_access_to_the_trace_registers_is_trapped_to_EL3_subject_to_the_exception_prioritization_rules_unless_it_is_trapped_by_CPACR

tcf:enumItem.description: This control does not cause any instructions to be trapped.
tcf:enumItem.name: This_control_does_not_cause_any_instructions_to_be_trapped

tcf:enumItem.description: Any attempt at any Exception level to execute an instruction that uses the registers associated with SVE, Advanced SIMD and floating-point is trapped to EL3, subject to the exception prioritization rules, unless it is trapped by CPTR_EL3.EZ.
tcf:enumItem.name: Any_attempt_at_any_Exception_level_to_execute_an_instruction_that_uses_the_registers_associated_with_SVE_Advanced_SIMD_and_floating_point_is_trapped_to_EL3_subject_to_the_exception_prioritization_rules_unless_it_is_trapped_by_CPTR_EL3

tcf:enumItem.description: This control causes these instructions executed at any Exception level to be trapped, subject to the exception prioritization rules.
tcf:enumItem.name: This_control_causes_these_instructions_executed_at_any_Exception_level_to_be_trapped_subject_to_the_exception_prioritization_rules

tcf:enumItem.description: This control does not cause any instruction to be trapped.
tcf:enumItem.name: This_control_does_not_cause_any_instruction_to_be_trapped
